query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPST0117 SET W_GBN = #W_GBN# ,W_WRITDAT = #WRITDAT# ,W_REQDAT = #REQDAT# ,W_REQMAN = #REQNM# ,W_WRKNM = #WRKNM# ,W_GBN2 = #LIFGBN# ,W_ADMNM = #MANNM# ,W_ADMTEL = #MANTEL# ,W_POSID = #W_POSID#
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND GUBUN = #GUBUN# AND HKONT = #HKONT# AND SEQNO = #SEQNO#
